title: Indian vegetable pakoras
ingredients: ['2 small potatoes', '2 red peppers, finely chopped', '100g frozen peas, thawed', '1 small onion, grated', '1 small bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 pinch asafoetida', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '225g gram flour (chickpea flour)', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', 'salt to taste', 'vegetable oil for frying']
